Sql.query: select * from trn_costo_marginal where cosmarcodi = :cosmarcodi

insert into trn_costo_marginal ( cosmarcodi, barrcodi, cosmarbarratransferencia, pericodi, facpercodi, cosmarversion, cosmardia, cosmar1, cosmar2, cosmar3, cosmar4, cosmar5, cosmar6, cosmar7, cosmar8, cosmar9, cosmar10, cosmar11, cosmar12, cosmar13, cosmar14, cosmar15, cosmar16, cosmar17, cosmar18, cosmar19, cosmar20, cosmar21, cosmar22, cosmar23, cosmar24, cosmar25, cosmar26, cosmar27, cosmar28, cosmar29, cosmar30, cosmar31, cosmar32, cosmar33, cosmar34, cosmar35, cosmar36, cosmar37, cosmar38, cosmar39, cosmar40, cosmar41, cosmar42, cosmar43, cosmar44, cosmar45, cosmar46, cosmar47, cosmar48, cosmar49, cosmar50, cosmar51, cosmar52, cosmar53, cosmar54, cosmar55, cosmar56, cosmar57, cosmar58, cosmar59, cosmar60, cosmar61, cosmar62, cosmar63, cosmar64, cosmar65, cosmar66, cosmar67, cosmar68, cosmar69, cosmar70, cosmar71, cosmar72, cosmar73, cosmar74, cosmar75, cosmar76, cosmar77, cosmar78, cosmar79, cosmar80, cosmar81, cosmar82, cosmar83, cosmar84, cosmar85, cosmar86, cosmar87, cosmar88, cosmar89, cosmar90, cosmar91, cosmar92, cosmar93, cosmar94, cosmar95, cosmar96, cosmarpromediodia, cosmarusername, cosmarfecins ) values ( :cosmarcodi, :barrcodi, :cosmarbarratransferencia, :pericodi, :facpercodi, :cosmarversion, :cosmardia, :cosmar1, :cosmar2, :cosmar3, :cosmar4, :cosmar5, :cosmar6, :cosmar7, :cosmar8, :cosmar9, :cosmar10, :cosmar11, :cosmar12, :cosmar13, :cosmar14, :cosmar15, :cosmar16, :cosmar17, :cosmar18, :cosmar19, :cosmar20, :cosmar21, :cosmar22, :cosmar23, :cosmar24, :cosmar25, :cosmar26, :cosmar27, :cosmar28, :cosmar29, :cosmar30, :cosmar31, :cosmar32, :cosmar33, :cosmar34, :cosmar35, :cosmar36, :cosmar37, :cosmar38, :cosmar39, :cosmar40, :cosmar41, :cosmar42, :cosmar43, :cosmar44, :cosmar45, :cosmar46, :cosmar47, :cosmar48, :cosmar49, :cosmar50, :cosmar51, :cosmar52, :cosmar53, :cosmar54, :cosmar55, :cosmar56, :cosmar57, :cosmar58, :cosmar59, :cosmar60, :cosmar61, :cosmar62, :cosmar63, :cosmar64, :cosmar65, :cosmar66, :cosmar67, :cosmar68, :cosmar69, :cosmar70, :cosmar71, :cosmar72, :cosmar73, :cosmar74, :cosmar75, :cosmar76, :cosmar77, :cosmar78, :cosmar79, :cosmar80, :cosmar81, :cosmar82, :cosmar83, :cosmar84, :cosmar85, :cosmar86, :cosmar87, :cosmar88, :cosmar89, :cosmar90, :cosmar91, :cosmar92, :cosmar93, :cosmar94, :cosmar95, :cosmar96, :cosmarpromediodia, :cosmarusername, :cosmarfecins )
delete from TRN_COSTO_MARGINAL_CONGENE where pericodi = :pericodi and congeneversion = :cosmarversion
delete from trn_costo_marginal where pericodi = :pericodi and cosmarversion = :cosmarversion
select nvl(max(cosmarcodi), 0) + 1 from trn_costo_marginal
select nvl(min(cosmarcodi), 0) - 2 from trn_costo_marginal

select distinct barrcodi, cosmarbarratransferencia from trn_costo_marginal where (pericodi= :pericodi or pericodi is null) and (cosmarversion= :cosmarversion or cosmarversion is null) order by cosmarbarratransferencia asc
select * from trn_costo_marginal where (pericodi= :pericodi or :pericodi is null)and (barrcodi = :barrcodi or :barrcodi is null) order by cosmardia asc

SELECT COSMARCODI, PERICODI, BARRCODI, FACPERCODI, COSMARVERSION, COSMARDIA , COSMARBARRATRANSFERENCIA, COSMARPROMEDIODIA , COSMAR1 , COSMAR2 , COSMAR3 , COSMAR4 , COSMAR5 , COSMAR6 , COSMAR7 , COSMAR8 , COSMAR9 , COSMAR10 , COSMAR11 , COSMAR12 , COSMAR13 , COSMAR14 , COSMAR15 , COSMAR16 , COSMAR17 , COSMAR18 , COSMAR19 , COSMAR20 , COSMAR21 , COSMAR22 , COSMAR23 , COSMAR24 , COSMAR25 , COSMAR26 , COSMAR27 , COSMAR28 , COSMAR29 , COSMAR30 , COSMAR31 , COSMAR32 , COSMAR33 , COSMAR34 , COSMAR35 , COSMAR36 , COSMAR37 , COSMAR38 , COSMAR39 , COSMAR40 , COSMAR41 , COSMAR42 , COSMAR43 , COSMAR44 , COSMAR45 , COSMAR46 , COSMAR47 , COSMAR48 , COSMAR49 , COSMAR50 , COSMAR51 , COSMAR52 , COSMAR53 , COSMAR54 , COSMAR55 , COSMAR56 , COSMAR57 , COSMAR58 , COSMAR59 , COSMAR60 , COSMAR61 , COSMAR62 , COSMAR63 , COSMAR64 , COSMAR65 , COSMAR66 , COSMAR67 , COSMAR68 , COSMAR69 , COSMAR70 , COSMAR71 , COSMAR72 , COSMAR73 , COSMAR74 , COSMAR75 , COSMAR76 , COSMAR77 , COSMAR78 , COSMAR79 , COSMAR80 , COSMAR81 , COSMAR82 , COSMAR83 , COSMAR84 , COSMAR85 , COSMAR86 , COSMAR87 , COSMAR88 , COSMAR89 , COSMAR90 , COSMAR91 , COSMAR92 , COSMAR93 , COSMAR94 , COSMAR95 , COSMAR96 , COSMARUSERNAME , COSMARFECINS FROM TRN_COSTO_MARGINAL WHERE PERICODI=:PERICODI AND COSMARVERSION=:COSMARVERSION AND BarrCodi=:BarrCodi order by barrcodi

select distinct barrcodi, cosmarbarratransferencia from trn_costo_marginal where barrcodi in (select barrcodi from trn_barra Where barrbarrabgr = 'SI') and (pericodi= :pericodi or pericodi is null) and (cosmarversion= :cosmarversion or cosmarversion is null) order by cosmarbarratransferencia asc
select * from trn_costo_marginal where ({0}='-1' or barrcodi = {0}) and pericodi = {1} and cosmarversion= {2} order by cosmardia asc
select * from trn_costo_marginal where (pericodi=:pericodi or :pericodi is null)
select distinct barrcodi, cosmarbarratransferencia from trn_costo_marginal where pericodi=:pericodi and cosmarversion=:cosmarversion order by cosmarbarratransferencia
select * from trn_costo_marginal where facpercodi = :facpercodi order by cosmardia asc

select distinct barrcodi, cosmarbarratransferencia from trn_costo_marginal where barrcodi in (select barrcodi from trn_barra Where barrbarrabgr = 'SI') and (pericodi= :pericodi or pericodi is null) and (cosmarversion= :cosmarversion or cosmarversion is null) order by cosmarbarratransferencia asc
select * from dtr_cmgbarra where idbarra = :barrcodi and mes = :pericodi and version = :cosmarversion order by dia asc
SELECT RECACODI,RECANOMBRE FROM TRN_RECALCULO WHERE PERICODI = {0}
select * from trn_costo_marginal where pericodi = :pericodi and cosmarversion = :cosmarversion and barrcodi = :barrcodi and cosmardia = :cosmardia

select * from ( select grupo_barra.emprnomb, grupo_barra.emprcodi, grupo_barra.barrnombre, grupo_barra.grupocodi, grupo_barra.gruponomb, to_date(per.perianiomes || cm.cosmardia,'YYYYMMDD') as medifecha, grupo_barra.HEQDATFECHA, grupo_barra.HEQDATESTADO, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY to_date(per.perianiomes || cm.cosmardia,'YYYYMMDD'),grupocodi ORDER BY to_date(per.perianiomes || cm.cosmardia,'YYYYMMDD'),grupocodi,grupo_barra.HEQDATFECHA DESC, grupo_barra.HEQDATESTADO desc) AS NUM, cm.* from trn_costo_marginal CM inner join trn_periodo per on cm.pericodi = per.pericodi inner join ( select distinct gr.grupocodi, gr.gruponomb,gr.GRUPOACTIVO,se.emprcodi, se.emprnomb,gr.grupopadre, grP.GRUPONOMB as CENTRAL, ba.barrcodi , ba.barrnombre ,vweq.HEQDATFECHA, vweq.HEQDATESTADO from trn_codigo_entrega CE inner join SI_HISEMPEQ_DATA vweq on (vweq.equicodi = ce.equicodi or vweq.EQUICODIOLD = ce.equicodi ) inner join eq_equipo eq on (eq.equipadre = vweq.equicodi or eq.equicodi = vweq.equicodi) or (eq.equipadre = vweq.equicodiold or eq.equicodi = vweq.equicodiold) inner join pr_grupo gr on eq.grupocodi= gr.grupocodi inner join pr_grupo grp on grp.grupocodi= gr.grupopadre inner join si_empresa se on se.emprcodi=vweq.emprcodi inner join trn_barra ba on ba.barrcodi = ce.barrcodi where (eq.famcodi = 2 OR eq.famcodi = 3 OR eq.famcodi = 36 OR eq.famcodi = 38) and (codentestado not like '%ELIMINADO%' and codentestado not like '%SINCODIGO%') and ba.barrcodi <>76 and gr.grupocodi>0 --and GR.grupoactivo = 'S' order by se.emprnomb,gr.grupocodi )grupo_barra on grupo_barra.barrcodi =CM.barrcodi and grupo_barra.HEQDATFECHA <= to_date(per.perianiomes || cm.cosmardia,'YYYYMMDD') where cm.pericodi = {0} and CM.cosmarversion = {1} order by cm.cosmardia, grupo_barra.emprnomb,grupo_barra.barrnombre,grupo_barra.gruponomb )where num = 1

SELECT ib.barrzarea, tb.barrnombre, tc.* FROM trn_costo_marginal tc inner join iee_barrazona ib ON tc.barrcodi = ib.barrcodi inner join trn_barra tb ON ib.barrcodi = tb.barrcodi WHERE tc.pericodi = {0} and ib.mrepcodi=242 and tc.cosmarversion = {1} and ib.barrzarea in({2})

select cosmardia, cosmar1*1000 as cosmar1, cosmar2*1000 as cosmar2, cosmar3*1000 as cosmar3, cosmar4*1000 as cosmar4, cosmar5*1000 as cosmar5, cosmar6*1000 as cosmar6, cosmar7*1000 as cosmar7, cosmar8*1000 as cosmar8, cosmar9*1000 as cosmar9, cosmar10*1000 as cosmar10, cosmar11*1000 as cosmar11, cosmar12*1000 as cosmar12, cosmar13*1000 as cosmar13, cosmar14*1000 as cosmar14, cosmar15*1000 as cosmar15, cosmar16*1000 as cosmar16, cosmar17*1000 as cosmar17, cosmar18*1000 as cosmar18, cosmar19*1000 as cosmar19, cosmar20*1000 as cosmar20, cosmar21*1000 as cosmar21, cosmar22*1000 as cosmar22, cosmar23*1000 as cosmar23, cosmar24*1000 as cosmar24, cosmar25*1000 as cosmar25, cosmar26*1000 as cosmar26, cosmar27*1000 as cosmar27, cosmar28*1000 as cosmar28, cosmar29*1000 as cosmar29, cosmar30*1000 as cosmar30, cosmar31*1000 as cosmar31, cosmar32*1000 as cosmar32, cosmar33*1000 as cosmar33, cosmar34*1000 as cosmar34, cosmar35*1000 as cosmar35, cosmar36*1000 as cosmar36, cosmar37*1000 as cosmar37, cosmar38*1000 as cosmar38, cosmar39*1000 as cosmar39, cosmar40*1000 as cosmar40, cosmar41*1000 as cosmar41, cosmar42*1000 as cosmar42, cosmar43*1000 as cosmar43, cosmar44*1000 as cosmar44, cosmar45*1000 as cosmar45, cosmar46*1000 as cosmar46, cosmar47*1000 as cosmar47, cosmar48*1000 as cosmar48, cosmar49*1000 as cosmar49, cosmar50*1000 as cosmar50, cosmar51*1000 as cosmar51, cosmar52*1000 as cosmar52, cosmar53*1000 as cosmar53, cosmar54*1000 as cosmar54, cosmar55*1000 as cosmar55, cosmar56*1000 as cosmar56, cosmar57*1000 as cosmar57, cosmar58*1000 as cosmar58, cosmar59*1000 as cosmar59, cosmar60*1000 as cosmar60, cosmar61*1000 as cosmar61, cosmar62*1000 as cosmar62, cosmar63*1000 as cosmar63, cosmar64*1000 as cosmar64, cosmar65*1000 as cosmar65, cosmar66*1000 as cosmar66, cosmar67*1000 as cosmar67, cosmar68*1000 as cosmar68, cosmar69*1000 as cosmar69, cosmar70*1000 as cosmar70, cosmar71*1000 as cosmar71, cosmar72*1000 as cosmar72, cosmar73*1000 as cosmar73, cosmar74*1000 as cosmar74, cosmar75*1000 as cosmar75, cosmar76*1000 as cosmar76, cosmar77*1000 as cosmar77, cosmar78*1000 as cosmar78, cosmar79*1000 as cosmar79, cosmar80*1000 as cosmar80, cosmar81*1000 as cosmar81, cosmar82*1000 as cosmar82, cosmar83*1000 as cosmar83, cosmar84*1000 as cosmar84, cosmar85*1000 as cosmar85, cosmar86*1000 as cosmar86, cosmar87*1000 as cosmar87, cosmar88*1000 as cosmar88, cosmar89*1000 as cosmar89, cosmar90*1000 as cosmar90, cosmar91*1000 as cosmar91, cosmar92*1000 as cosmar92, cosmar93*1000 as cosmar93, cosmar94*1000 as cosmar94, cosmar95*1000 as cosmar95, cosmar96*1000 as cosmar96, (cosmar1 + cosmar2 + cosmar3 + cosmar4 + cosmar5 + cosmar6 + cosmar7 + cosmar8 + cosmar9 + cosmar10 + cosmar11 + cosmar12 + cosmar13 + cosmar14 + cosmar15 + cosmar16 + cosmar17 + cosmar18 + cosmar19 + cosmar20 + cosmar21 + cosmar22 + cosmar23 + cosmar24 + cosmar25 + cosmar26 + cosmar27 + cosmar28 + cosmar29 + cosmar30 + cosmar31 + cosmar32 + cosmar33 + cosmar34 + cosmar35 + cosmar36 + cosmar37 + cosmar38 + cosmar39 + cosmar40 + cosmar41 + cosmar42 + cosmar43 + cosmar44 + cosmar45 + cosmar46 + cosmar47 + cosmar48 + cosmar49 + cosmar50 + cosmar51 + cosmar52 + cosmar53 + cosmar54 + cosmar55 + cosmar56 + cosmar57 + cosmar58 + cosmar59 + cosmar60 + cosmar61 + cosmar62 + cosmar63 + cosmar64 + cosmar65 + cosmar66 + cosmar67 + cosmar68 + cosmar69 + cosmar70 + cosmar71 + cosmar72 + cosmar73 + cosmar74 + cosmar75 + cosmar76 + cosmar77 + cosmar78 + cosmar79 + cosmar80 + cosmar81 + cosmar82 + cosmar83 + cosmar84 + cosmar85 + cosmar86 + cosmar87 + cosmar88 + cosmar89 + cosmar90 + cosmar91 + cosmar92 + cosmar93 + cosmar94 + cosmar95 + cosmar96)*1000 as cosmarpromediodia from trn_costo_marginal cm, trn_codigo_entrega ce where cm.pericodi = :pericodi and cm.cosmarversion = :cosmarversion and cm.barrcodi = ce.barrcodi and ce.codentcodi = :barrcodi order by cosmardia
